verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] presenting a skewed portrait of how the world does business with the U.S to rationalize his escalating trade dispute with allies . At the same time , he 's glossing over aspects of the U.S. economy that do n't support his faulty contention that it 's the best it 's ever been .
